text: Brad Bufanda (Fred Joseph Bufanda III; May 4, 1983 – November 1, 2017) was an American actor. He was best known for his self-made internet videos. Bufanda was born in Upland, California. His career began in 1995. While in middle school he appeared on the ABC television series Roseanne and Hangin' with Mr. Cooper. He was best known for his role as David in A Cinderella Story. Bufanda played Felix Toombs in the series Veronica Mars and was also featured in the movie. He starred in the Cinemax series Co-Ed Confidential from 2008–2010. On November 1, 2017 in Los Angeles, California, Bufanda died by suicide by jumping off of his residential tower in the Park La Brea apartment community. He was 34. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1983 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actors from San Bernardino, California Category:Actors who committed suicide Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Suicides by jumping in the United States
title: Brad Bufanda
